metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20004 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue has been found in Mini-XML (aka mxml) 2.12. It is a stack-based buffer overflow in mxml_write_node in mxml-file.c via vectors involving a double-precision floating point number and the '<order type="real">' substring, as demonstrated by testmxml.

criterions.comment: mxml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
